item.title: django middleware
item.description: MIDDLEWARE/get_response 5.2 django处理http请求源码 def __call__(self, environ, start_response): set_script_prefix(get_script_name(environ)) signals.request_started.send(sender=self.__class__, environ=environ) # WSGIRequest对象 -> HttpRequest类 request = self.request_class(environ) # response是什么 response = self.get_response(request)
